description: Handy and Compact Microfiber Cloths - Clean Your Screens With EaseEvery smart phone and tablet owner has encountered irritating dirt, dust, and smudges on their touchscreen. This not only looks terrible, but makes it so much harder to view what's on the device! Rather than hopelessly scrub away at your screen with a shirt sleeve, carry one of our compact cloths with you to effortlessly clean away any marks or smears.We use high quality microfiber to make our cloths, which means they are extremely soft and gentle. The millions of tiny fibers in the cloths gently lift away dirt and grime from any delicate surface, leaving no marks or scratches.These cloths are also reusable, so you'll save money and cut down on household waste. You can wash them by hand or machine, but avoid ironing or bleaching.One Year Money Back Guarantee - We Value Your SatisfactionClick Add To Cart at the top of the page to get yours!Contents:16 x Colorful Cleaning Cloths (black, blue, grey, green, light , blue, orange, white, yellow)2 x ECO-FUSED® Microfiber Cleaning ClothsECO-FUSEDIf for any reason you are unhappy with any product by ECO-FUSED, please do not hesitate to contact us. We take full ownership and responsibility for the quality of our products and will do our very best to solve your problem quickly and efficiently!
